import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Schedule part import"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/import/{FileId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Schedules a background job to import parts from an uploaded file.

**Prerequisites**:
- **FileId**: First upload the import file using the Files API

**Workflow**:
1. Upload the import file using [POST /api/v1.0/files](/docs/api/files/upload-file)
2. Configure field mappings in the request body
3. Schedule the import job - returns a JobId for tracking
4. Monitor job status using the Jobs API

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"FileId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the uploaded import file.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Import configuration with field mappings.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Configuration for importing parts from a file.","properties":{"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product module identifier for the import."},"Worksheet":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based index of the field in the import file."},"FieldIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based column index in the import file."},"Maps":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Maps an import field.","nullable":true,"type":"object"}},"title":"PartImportMappings"}},"title":"PartImportConfiguration"},"example":{"ProductId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb0001","Worksheet":0,"Mappings":{"PartName":{"MapType":"column","FieldIndex":0},"StandardSupplierName":{"MapType":"column","FieldIndex":1},"StandardCost":{"MapType":"column","FieldIndex":2},"QuantityOnHand":{"MapType":"column","FieldIndex":3}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Import job scheduled successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response wrapper for scheduling a part import job.","properties":{"ItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the scheduled import job."},"Item":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the scheduled import job (duplicate for compatibility)."},"Success":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the operation was successful."},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"List of error messages, if any."}},"title":"PartImportJobResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request - file not found or invalid configuration."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
